definition: oil used to lubricate the moving parts of a motor

positive_examples: This is an example of motor oil.
The motor oil demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed motor oil in this context.
A typical case of motor oil would involve these features.
The concept of motor oil applies here.
A liquid lubricant specifically designed for internal combustion engines to reduce friction between moving parts.
negative_examples: This is an example of grease, not motor oil.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Grease, or other types of Lubricant
